body:
Gy pointed out I should use my computers IP address. After so reading about local servers I found that when I run a django server on my mac it can't be accessed from my iPad.

Therefore For me to get it to work i need to link the ipad to my mac by being on the same network and putting the IP address in the URL.

I havent gotten it working but I need to focus on the front end development at this time but for whatever travelers run upon this post this link should help.

Access localhost on Mac from XCode? Phonegap communicating with Ajax to a local Rails app

I will hopefully get it working in the future and update this answer.

Cheers
title: iOS api call to local RESTful Django fails
